message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This extraordinary item carries a unique value that surpasses its monetary worth, making it an unparalleled investment. We are offering this masterpiece for $2000000. We believe that this price reflects not only the cost of production but also the immense value it holds for someone like you. Let's embark on a journey of mutual benefit and satisfaction. Looking forward to your response.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but my budget allows me to only pay up to $1500000 for it. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.
